```{r setup, include=FALSE}
  library(tidyverse)
  library(tibble)
```

# Hood flow

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  hood_flow <- 4  # m^3/min

  save(hood_flow, file = "../r_files/hood_flow.Rda")
```

# Fuel properties

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  fuel_properties <- tibble::data_frame(fuel = c("Douglas Fir",
                                                  "Eucalyptus",
                                                  "Oak",
                                                  "Coconut Charcoal",
                                                  "Lump Hardwood (Med.)",
                                                  "Lump Hardwood (Sm.)",
                                                  "Eucalyptus Pellets",
                                                  "West Slope Pellets",
                                                  "Kerosene",
                                                  "Liquefied Petroleum Gas"),
                                         lhv = c(18658, 19427, 18658, 16628,
                                                 28611, 28611, 17501, 17501,
                                                 43100, 46100),  # kJ/kg
                                         carbon_fraction = c(0.497733333, 0.521166667,
                                                             0.5, 0.488, 0.840833333,
                                                             0.840833333, 0.4852,
                                                             0.4852, 0.82, 0.82))  # kg_C/kg_fuel

  save(fuel_properties, file = "../r_files/fuel_properties.Rda")
```

# Instrument specific constants

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  filter_area <- 11.79  # cm^2
  voc_flow <- .0135  # L/min
  smps_const <- 0.015625355  # dlogDp
  
  save(filter_area, voc_flow, smps_const, file = "../r_files/inst_constants.Rda")
```

# Calculation constants

```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='markup', cache=FALSE}
  hfg_water <- 2257  #kJ/kg
  c_water <- 4.186  # J/g C
  R <- 8.314  # J/K mol

  save(hfg_water, c_water, R, file = "../r_files/calc_constants.Rda")
```
